text: Rubén Anguiano (17 November 1955 – 28 September 2020) was a Mexican footballer. He played as a midfielder. Anguiano played for Zacatepec, Leones Negros and Atlante. He was born in Mexico City. He earned 8 caps for the Mexican national team between 1974 and 1977. Anguiano died on 28 September 2020 aged 64, from COVID-19 in Mexico City, aged 64. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico City Category:Mexican footballers
title: Rubén Anguiano
